Corporate Social Responsibility Report | 6AMERIS: 2020 AT A GLANCE

been collected and $900,000  donated since 2010.$1.5 Million  Donated to Philanthropic and Civic Organizations

Since 2018, more than $6 million to rural Georgia hospitals $88,762  Donated through Ameris Bank School Spirit Program
And more than $498,000 donated since program started in 2014
